title: NBA Champion

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the LA Clippers win the 2024-2025 NBA Championship. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

This market will resolve to “No” if it becomes impossible for this team to become 2024-25 NBA Champion based off the rules of the NBA.
